attributes.action: Intervene in the event that Donald J Trump becomes the 45th US President.
attributes.additional_details:
Everything below is evidence towards him comments and immature ideas.

http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/2016/03/22/donald-trumps-most-outrageous-quotes/

http://www.telegraph.co.uk/women/politics/donald-trump-sexism-tracker-every-offensive-comment-in-one-place/
attributes.background: Donald J Trump will become the 45th US President in 2017. He has a history of racism, sexism and crude comments about females and ethnic minorities. He has suggested outrageous ideas such as leaving NATO and cutting free-trade. Not to mention his incestuous comments about his daughter

rejection.details: You may wish to start another petition setting out precisely what action you would like the Government or Parliament to take to intervene.
